summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5134 for the improvement of Graham Street, from Beacon Avenue to 39th Avenue South; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 59190, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
